aboutpara: I'm currently on leave from Finance/Math at UPenn Wharton. I'm the cofounder of VO2, backed by Techstars, Rough Draft Ventures, and Eberg Capital. On campus, I was part of the Genesis Cohort of Wharton's Cypher Accelerator. Prior to that, I went through through Jane Street's SEE program and was a Venture Analyst at Redbud Brands. I'm passionate about DeFi (specifically bringing real assets on chain), prediction markets, making derivatives more accessible, basketball, and surfing.
